actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to provide for the immediate deportation of aliens who are arrested and refuse to disclose their identity to law enforcement officers.

summary.text: Amends the Immigration and Nationality Act to provide for the immediate deportation of aliens who are arrested and refuse to disclose their identities to properly identified law enforcement officers.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to provide for the immediate deportation of aliens who are arrested and refuse to disclose their identity to law enforcement officers.
